overview: Abbie is a rich and spoiled teenager. At her daddy's mountain house, she has organized a lavish and slavish orgy with her classmates Roxy Taggart, Rihanna Samuel, Laura Crystal, Aleska Diamond, Mandy Dee and Kristine Crystal These pretty little rich girls have it all: money, looks and more hard cocks than they know what to do with.
title: Daddy's Girls Gone Crazy
